name: epub
title: ePub Creator
description: Creates ePub e-book files from web pagesCurrently supports Firefox'es reader mode and 'overdrive.com's online reader.
author: Niklas Gollenstede

preferences.name: setNavProperty
preferences.title: Set 'nav' property
preferences.description: Standard compliant when set, but disables the navigation in Sumatra PDF

preferences.name: collectStyles
preferences.title: Keep style information
preferences.description: If enabled, some style information are extracted. Some readers won't be able to change the font size when styles are set.
